name: Sala - Bruh Moment
text: Destroy one card you control; Banish 2 cards from either player's GY. While this card is in the GY, you can banish this card then target 1 monster your opponent controls; Negate its effects until the end of this turn. You can only use 1 effect of "Sala - Bruh Moment" per turn and only once that turn.
